name: S'mores Cones Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: waffle cone, peanut butter, mini marshmallows, chocolate chips
recipeInstructionSteps: Line the inside of a waffle cone with peanut butter.
Fill with mini marshmallows and chocolate chips.
Place on a grill and cover for 2 minutes, flip at the 1 minute mark.
Remove with tongs and let cool.
